price: 12. Kaadu baaxó tanfuxxuke daroorih keenil qanxisneeh, qaran kee baaxó lce tongooroweh ken finqay nummah Yalli keenil mekleh yanih.
arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wafajjarnā al-arḍa ʿuyūnan fal-taqā al-māu ʿalā amrin qad qudira
